game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: In this quest, you must search for the lost treasure of the ancient civilization. Follow clues, solve puzzles, and overcome challenges to uncover the location of the treasure. Beware of traps and enemies along the way!
game.reward: Ancient artifacts and a chest full of gold coins

task.description: You have obtained an old map that holds the key to finding the treasure. Decode the symbols and markings on the map to reveal the next clue.

task.objective: Retrieve the key from the secret chamber
task.description: A secret chamber holds a key that is crucial for unlocking the entrance to the treasure room. Explore the ancient ruins and find the hidden chamber to retrieve the key.

task.objective: Pass the trial of the guardians
task.description: The treasure room is guarded by ancient guardians. To gain access, you must prove your worth by completing a series of physical and mental challenges set by the guardians.

task.objective: Explore the treasure room and claim your reward
task.description: Finally, you have reached the treasure room. Explore its wonders, collect the ancient artifacts, and uncover the chest full of gold coins that await you.
